entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person present in the scene, described as being reluctant to participate in the Christmas celebration.

entities.name: sprout
entities.description: Sprout is a person present in the scene, but no further description is provided.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Flitwick is a person present in the scene, described as being there along with Snape and Sprout.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a person present in the scene, described as the caretaker who had taken off his usual brown coat.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person present in the scene, described as saying Merry Christmas and offering crackers to Snape.

entities.name: harry

entities.name: ron

entities.name: hermione

relationships.description: Dumbledore swapped his hat with Snape's hat.
